DOC.brief_summary: This study examine pharmacological precondition post conditioning desflurane compare cardiac troponin release patient receive either desflurane propofol aortic valve surgery .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients schedule aortic valve replacement use cardiopulmonary bypass include study . Patients assign desflurane group ( Des ) propofol group ( Prop ) . Des receive desflurane ( 1-2 MAC ) inhalation induction anesthesia cardiopulmonary bypass ( CPB ) . After induction CPB , anesthesia Des switch total intravenous anesthesia ( TIVA ) propofol . Prop receive TIVA surgery . All patient receive continuous infusion remifentanil . Biomarker myocardial damage troponin I examine 4 point ; T1 : induction anesthesia , T2 : arrival ICU , T3 : 12 hour ICU arrival , T4 : 24 hour ICU arrival , T5 : third post operative day ( 3POD ) .
DOC.criteria: Patients schedule aortic valve replacement use cardiopulmonary bypass . Patients young 20 year old . Recent myocardial infarction ( within 1 year ) . Renal dysfunction ( GFR less 50ml/min ) . Known allergy study drug include propofol .
